title: Modern Apartment, Unique Style, Awesome Location
posting_body: Experience the convenience of living in a centrally located community within the heart of Silicon Valley.
Our community is being transformed into a modern, vibrant living center with unparalleled quality of living.
Enjoy the convenience and reliability of our package lockers for all of your deliveries.
Ample parking is available for residents.
All of these features and many more are available to our residents.
In order to assure the highest quality of living for our residents, some restrictions apply (breed, weight, etc. call for details!)
In addition to our community amenities, all our residents can enjoy modern in-unit laundry machines as well as upgraded stainless-steel kitchen appliances including dishwashers and microwaves.
Our apartments also come with recessed lighting in the living area, as well as brand-new double-paned windows.
Seize the opportunity to reserve your dream apartment today with only a $600 deposit, which is fully refundable within two days.
Be sure to ask about our latest move-in specials!
Peartree's friendly and knowledgeable management staff will guide you through the simple application process and ensure that your move-in is free of uncertainties.
Call us today to schedule a virtual tour of your new home!
We hope to see you soon!
Peartree Apartments in Sunnyvale offers modern one- and two-bedroom apartments with all the amenities your looking for in a home.
Ideally located in the heart of Sunnyvale with easy access to the US-101 and just minutes away from all the shops, restaurants and entertainment of Murphy street.
